org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.title: Vitals: SapMachine11: sleep time too long
org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.body:
With the integration of the last vitals changes into SapMachine11 (#820, 0aad4b7) an error crept in (SapMachine11 only):
SapMachine/src/hotspot/share/vitals/vitals.cpp
Line 934 in ca09513
os::sleep(this, get_sample_interval_ms() * 1000, false); sleep time is too long. os::sleep() takes ms, not seconds.
Tests: manual tests, Vitals jtreg tests (which obviously need pimping up, but that's for another day)
fixes #896
